dict.string: Angry Birds is a puzzle video game developed by Rovio Entertainment. In the game, players use a slingshot to launch birds at pigs stationed in or around various structures with the goal of destroying all the pigs on the playing field.
Lead your clan to victory! Clash of Clans is an epic combat strategy game. Build your village, train your troops and battle with thousands of enemy
Switch and match your way through more than 400 levels in this delicious and addictive puzzle adventure.Ain't it the sweetest game ever?
Build a magical world in Dragon City! Clain hundreds of dragons
The world's largest online poker room
Pet Rescue Saga is the new hit puzzle game from the makers of Candy Crush Saga
